message: Guarantee F (Budget / Circuit Breakers) is NOT IMPLEMENTED: Gate O is a STUB. Run config schema does not include budget fields. No runtime budget enforcement exists. Without budgets, runaway processes can consume unlimited resources (time, tokens, API calls, file writes).
suggested_fix:
Implement budget config and runtime enforcement:
1. Extend specs/schemas/run_config.schema.json with budgets object:
   - max_runtime_s: integer
   - max_llm_calls: integer
   - max_llm_tokens: integer
   - max_file_writes: integer
   - max_patch_attempts: integer
2. Update tools/validate_budgets_config.py (Gate O) to validate budget fields in all non-template configs
3. Implement runtime enforcement in orchestrator:
   - src/launch/orchestrator/budget_tracker.py
   - Track metrics during run
   - Raise BudgetExceededError when limit reached
4. Add circuit breakers for external services (telemetry, commit service)
5. Add tests in tests/unit/orchestrator/test_budget_tracker.py
